title: The Lure of the Potent Dad Nut
description:
From epic Midwestern Halloween tales to living room awards show presenters to the unparalleled magnetism of dads with kids, this episode is full of all the news you can use, including:
Wisconsin is litty, there's no such thing as a Laffy Taffy soup kitchen, and sometimes nuts taste like old boot and clorofil. That's life in 2020.  Deal with it.

To follow Trixie: @TrixieMattel
To follow Katya: @Katya_Zamo
To listen to our podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/TBATBYT 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
